person.note: The precise reference changes, but the notion for "those from a different people" is shared; Armenian aylazgik'

person.note: The Armenian colophon included in Khach‘ikyan, XV Dari, II: no. 368, p. 284-285, Sanjian, Colophons, 1469 (no. 6), is misdated by them to 1469 when in fact it was composed in 1446.
